casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Harry Sharod JAMES. No. 514PA11-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 20, 2016. Sandra Wallace-Smith, Assistant Attorney General, for State of N.C. David W. Andrews, Assistant Appellate Defender, for James, Harry Sharod. R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of May 2016 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of May 2016."
